description: Conversation where a planner adds a last‑minute guest to an event, updates the RSVP list, and sends an updated seating‑chart email to all attendees.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails. Use the provided tools when appropriate and always confirm actions with the user.
I just heard from Jordan Lee that they'll attend the gala on May 14th. Please add Jordan to the RSVP list for event ID event_12345 and send the updated seating chart to everyone.
Got it! I’ll add Jordan Lee to the RSVP list for event event_12345 and then email the updated seating chart to all confirmed guests.

arguments.subject: Updated Seating Chart for the May 14th Gala
arguments.body:
Hello everyone,

The seating chart for our gala on May 14th has been updated to include our new guest, Jordan Lee. Please find the latest chart attached.

Looking forward to seeing you all!

Best regards,
EventPlannerPro Team
